Name: Chaos Law
About the game: Chaos law is a visual novel (with 10 chapters and 5 endings and odd mini games included) about the world and how it changes depending on how we view it. The genre and style constantly changes from meta-comedy to psychological horror. . The game is partly voice acted. There will be fully animated cutscenes and a very diverse soundtrack. The Story is about a high school girl who is the reincarnation of the goddess of chaos, who is forced to judge the world. And a clone trying to find their place in it
